stage_identity.evidence: Teen Byte maintains canonical gangly proportions, cyan-blue color, and recognizable silhouette. Long limbs and teen body shape consistent with stage anchor.

pixel_style.evidence: Clean pixel art style preserved with dithered shading, readable silhouette, and consistent 2D forms. No photorealistic drift or noisy rendering.

requested_changes_visible.evidence: Evening lighting transition clearly visible - window shows purple-blue evening tones with city lights. Byte's eyes show subtle tiredness with gentle droop. Mood shifted from bright afternoon to calm evening.

artifact_free.evidence: No garbled text, floating glyphs, malformed anatomy, duplicated parts, or smeared objects. Clean render throughout.

prop_layout_integrity.evidence: Single 10-day trophy positioned on left side of shelf. Single succulent on right side of shelf with clear spacing between them. Single food bowl on floor to the right. No prop overlap or duplication.

anchors_present.evidence: Desk with oversized laptop in standard position. Chicago skyline visible through window. Trophy shelf mounted on wall. All scene anchors intact.

temporal_mood_match.evidence: Evening time (9 PM Chicago) correctly reflected in purple-blue window lighting and Byte's gently tired expression. Not sleeping but showing appropriate evening wind-down. Content mood maintained.

reground_cleanup.evidence: Check not applicable for normal mode edit.
